vegetables.title: Tomato
vegetables.description: Known for its juicy texture and sweet-tart flavor, tomatoes are a versatile ingredient widely used in salads, sauces, and various culinary dishes.

vegetables.title: Potato
vegetables.description: Renowned for their versatility and comforting taste, potatoes are a kitchen staple cherished in countless recipes worldwide. Whether mashed, roasted, or fried, these humble tubers never fail to satisfy.

vegetables.title: Ginger
vegetables.description: Ginger, prized for its versatility and distinctive flavor, is a beloved ingredient in kitchens worldwide. Whether used fresh in stir-fries, grated into teas, or incorporated into marinades, this aromatic root adds warmth and depth to a variety of dishes

vegetables.title: Mushrooms (Shiitake)
vegetables.description: Mushrooms are celebrated for their versatility and rich flavor. Whether sautéed, grilled, or added to soups, these fungi bring depth and earthiness to a wide range of dishes.

vegetables.title: Carrot
vegetables.description: Carrots are loved for their crisp texture and naturally sweet flavor. Whether enjoyed raw as a crunchy snack, grated into salads, or cooked in soups and stews, these nutritious root vegetables add a burst of color and taste to any meal.

vegetables.title: Parsley
vegetables.description: Parsley is a versatile herb known for its crisp texture and fresh flavor. Whether as a garnish or in salads, it adds brightness to any dish.

vegetables.title: Pumpkin
vegetables.description: Pumpkins, known for their crisp texture and natural sweetness, are cherished for their versatility. Whether roasted for a snack, grated into salads, or blended into soups and stews, these nutritious gourds bring vibrant color and flavor to every dish.

vegetables.title: Garlic
vegetables.description: Garlic is celebrated for its pungent flavor and aromatic qualities. Whether minced into sauces, roasted whole for a mellow taste, or sautéed to add depth to dishes, this versatile bulb adds a bold and distinctive flavor to a wide range of cuisines.

vegetables.title: Cucumber
vegetables.description: Cucumbers are known for their crisp texture and refreshing taste. Whether sliced in salads, pickled for a tangy crunch, or enjoyed on their own as a hydrating snack, these versatile vegetables add a cool and rejuvenating element to any dish.

vegetables.title: Onion (White)
vegetables.description: Onions are prized for their pungent flavor and culinary versatility. Whether caramelized to add sweetness to savory dishes, diced into salads for a zesty kick, or used as a flavorful base for soups and sauces, these aromatic bulbs are a staple ingredient in kitchens worldwide.

vegetables.title: Onion (Red)
vegetables.description: Onions are prized for their pungent flavor and culinary versatility. Whether caramelized to add sweetness to savory dishes, diced into salads for a zesty kick, or used as a flavorful base for soups and sauces, these aromatic bulbs are a staple ingredient in kitchens worldwide.

vegetables.title: Pepper (Red)
vegetables.description: Known for their vibrant colors, crisp texture, and sweet flavor, bell peppers are versatile vegetables that add a refreshing crunch and a hint of sweetness to salads, stir-fries, and other culinary creations.

vegetables.title: Pepper (Yellow)
vegetables.description: Known for their vibrant colors, crisp texture, and sweet flavor, bell peppers are versatile vegetables that add a refreshing crunch and a hint of sweetness to salads, stir-fries, and other culinary creations.

vegetables.title: Pepper (Green)
vegetables.description: Known for their vibrant colors, crisp texture, and sweet flavor, bell peppers are versatile vegetables that add a refreshing crunch and a hint of sweetness to salads, stir-fries, and other culinary creations.

vegetables.title: Pepper (Orange)
vegetables.description: Known for their vibrant colors, crisp texture, and sweet flavor, bell peppers are versatile vegetables that add a refreshing crunch and a hint of sweetness to salads, stir-fries, and other culinary creations.

vegetables.title: Eggplant
vegetables.description: Eggplants, with their glossy purple skin and creamy flesh, offer a unique flavor and texture. Whether grilled to perfection, roasted until tender, or used in hearty stews and casseroles, these versatile vegetables bring a rich and satisfying element to your culinary creations.

vegetables.title: Broccoli
vegetables.description: Broccoli, with its vibrant green florets and crisp stalks, is a nutritious powerhouse packed with vitamins and fiber. Whether steamed until tender-crisp, roasted to enhance its nutty flavor, or added to stir-fries for a crunchy texture, this versatile vegetable adds a burst of freshness and goodness to any meal.

vegetables.title: Lettuce
vegetables.description: Known for its juicy texture and sweet-tart flavor, tomatoes are a versatile ingredient widely used in salads, sauces, and various culinary dishes.

vegetables.title: Sweet Potato
vegetables.description: Known for its juicy texture and sweet-tart flavor, tomatoes are a versatile ingredient widely used in salads, sauces, and various culinary dishes.

vegetables.title: Beet
vegetables.description: Known for its juicy texture and sweet-tart flavor, tomatoes are a versatile ingredient widely used in salads, sauces, and various culinary dishes.

vegetables.title: Corn
vegetables.description: Known for its juicy texture and sweet-tart flavor, tomatoes are a versatile ingredient widely used in salads, sauces, and various culinary dishes.

vegetables.title: Cabbage (Red)
vegetables.description: Renowned for its bold hue, hearty texture, and slightly peppery taste, red cabbage is a versatile vegetable that lends vibrant color and robust flavor to salads, slaws, stir-fries, and various other culinary dishes.

vegetables.title: Cabbage (Green)
vegetables.description: Renowned for its bold hue, hearty texture, and slightly peppery taste, red cabbage is a versatile vegetable that lends vibrant color and robust flavor to salads, slaws, stir-fries, and various other culinary dishes.

vegetables.title: Squash
vegetables.description: Squash is a versatile vegetable with a hearty texture and slightly sweet taste, perfect for salads, soups, and other dishes.

vegetables.title: Radish
vegetables.description: Radish is a crisp and peppery root vegetable, often used to add a fresh and spicy flavor to salads, sandwiches, and various dishes.

vegetables.title: Chilli Pepper (Green)
vegetables.description: Chilli Pepper is known for its vibrant color and spicy flavor, adding heat and depth to a wide range of dishes including salsas, stir-fries, and marinades.

vegetables.title: Chilli Pepper (Red)
vegetables.description: Chilli Pepper is known for its vibrant color and spicy flavor, adding heat and depth to a wide range of dishes including salsas, stir-fries, and marinades.

fruits.title: Apple (Hermon apple)
fruits.description: Apples are crisp, juicy, and sweet fruits that come in various colors and flavors. They are rich in fiber and vitamin C.

fruits.title: Apple (Smith)
fruits.description: Apples are crisp, juicy, and sweet fruits that come in various colors and flavors. They are rich in fiber and vitamin C.

fruits.title: Apple (Pink Lady)
fruits.description: Apples are crisp, juicy, and sweet fruits that come in various colors and flavors. They are rich in fiber and vitamin C.

fruits.title: Apple (Golden Delicious)
fruits.description: Apples are crisp, juicy, and sweet fruits that come in various colors and flavors. They are rich in fiber and vitamin C.

fruits.title: Pears
fruits.description: Pears are renowned for their crispness, juiciness, and sweet flavor, coming in diverse colors and tastes. Loaded with fiber, they offer both a delightful snack and a healthy addition to meals.

fruits.title: Banana
fruits.description: Bananas are elongated, yellow fruits with a creamy texture and sweet taste. They are a good source of potassium and vitamin B6.

fruits.title: Watermelon
fruits.description: Watermelon is a refreshing fruit with a juicy, sweet flesh and a crisp texture. It is high in water content and rich in vitamins A and C.

fruits.title: Orange
fruits.description: Oranges are round citrus fruits with a bright orange skin and juicy, sweet-tart flesh. They are high in vitamin C and antioxidants.

fruits.title: Grapefruite
fruits.description: Grapefruits are round citrus fruits with a bright orange skin and juicy, sweet-tart flesh. Packed with vitamin C and antioxidants, they offer a refreshing and nutritious addition to your diet.

fruits.title: Lime
fruits.description: Limes are round citrus fruits with a vibrant green skin and juicy, tangy flesh. Rich in vitamin C and antioxidants, they are a zesty addition to any dish or beverage.

fruits.title: Kiwi
fruits.description: Kiwis are small, oval fruits with fuzzy brown skin and bright green flesh with tiny black seeds. They are rich in vitamin C, vitamin K, and fiber.

fruits.title: Melons
fruits.description: Melons are small, oval fruits with fuzzy brown skin and juicy, bright green flesh dotted with tiny black seeds. They are packed with vitamin C, vitamin K, and fiber, offering a refreshing and nutritious treat.

fruits.title: Melons (Cantaloupe)
fruits.description: Melons are small, oval fruits with fuzzy brown skin and juicy, bright green flesh dotted with tiny black seeds. They are packed with vitamin C, vitamin K, and fiber, offering a refreshing and nutritious treat.

fruits.title: Mango
fruits.description: Mangoes are tropical stone fruits with a sweet, juicy flesh and a unique flavor profile. They are rich in vitamins A and C.

fruits.title: Pitaya
fruits.description: Pitaya, also known as dragon fruit, is a tropical fruit with vibrant pink skin and a sweet, mildly tangy flavor. It is rich in antioxidants and vitamin C.

fruits.title: Coconut
fruits.description: Coconut, a tropical fruit with its distinctive hard shell and creamy white flesh, boasts a sweet and nutty flavor. Rich in healthy fats and antioxidants, coconut is not only delicious but also offers numerous health benefits.

fruits.title: Pomegranate
fruits.description: Pomegranates are round fruits with a thick, leathery skin and juicy, ruby-red seeds. They are rich in antioxidants and have a sweet-tart flavor.

fruits.title: Lemon
fruits.description: Lemons are sour citrus fruits with a bright yellow skin and acidic juice. They are used in cooking, baking, and beverages for their tangy flavor.

fruits.title: Pineapple
fruits.description: Pineapples are tropical fruits with a spiky, tough skin and sweet, juicy flesh. They are rich in vitamin C and manganese.

fruits.title: Strawberry
fruits.description: Strawberries are bright red, juicy berries with a sweet flavor and a slightly tart undertone. They are packed with vitamin C, fiber, and antioxidants.

fruits.title: Grapes (Green)
fruits.description: Grapes (Green) are crisp and refreshing fruits with a sweet flavor and a hint of tartness. They are enjoyed fresh as a snack, in salads, or pressed into refreshing juices and wines.

fruits.title: Grapes (Red)
fruits.description: Grapes (Green) are crisp and refreshing fruits with a sweet flavor and a hint of tartness. They are enjoyed fresh as a snack, in salads, or pressed into refreshing juices and wines.

bakery.title: Croissant
bakery.description: Enjoy our buttery and flaky croissant, perfect for breakfast or a tasty snack!

bakery.title: Blueberry Muffins
bakery.description: Indulge in our moist and bursting-with-flavor blueberry muffins, ideal for breakfast or a delightful snack!

bakery.title: Bread Basket
bakery.description: Enjoy our tasty selection of different types of bread. From crunchy baguettes to soft brioche, there's something for everyone in our basket!

bakery.title: Bagel
bakery.description: Savor our chewy and flavorful bagel, great for breakfast or a quick bite on the go!

bakery.title: Mixed Seed Sourdough
bakery.description: Try our hearty sourdough bread packed with mixed seeds for a nutritious and delicious slice every time!

bakery.title: Chocolate Croissant
bakery.description: Indulge in our delightful croissant filled with rich chocolate, perfect for a sweet treat anytime!

bakery.title: Burger Buns
bakery.description: Enjoy our soft and fluffy burger buns, the perfect partner for your favorite burgers!

bakery.title: Chocolate Chip Cookie
bakery.description: Enjoy a classic comfort of our Chocolate Chip Cookie. Baked to perfection with golden edges and gooey chocolate chips, it's a timeless treat for any occasion

bakery.title: Chocolate brownie
bakery.description: Delight in the irresistible goodness of our Chocolate Brownie. Made with rich cocoa, it's a heavenly treat for chocolate lovers !

bakery.title: Cinnamon roll
bakery.description: Savor the deliciousness of our Cinnamon Roll. With its perfect mix of cinnamon and sugar, it's a treat you won't want to miss !
